name: Bibliotheca Platonica (IAPSOP)
content:
Bibliotheca Platonica (IAPSOP) About Archives Practices Contribute Contacts Search     Periodical: Bibliotheca Platonica Summary:  From Pat Deveney's database: Bibliotheca Platonica. An Exponent of the Platonic Philosophy. 1889-1890 Bimonthly (irregular) Osceola, MO. Editor: Thomas Moore Johnson. Succeeds: The Platonist 1/1, July-August 1889-December 1890, 4 issues only. 48-82 pp., $3.00 a year. See notes on The Platonist, of which this is the successor. The journal more strictly restricted itself to translations and avoided the occult contributions that had appeared in and arguably detracted from the scholarly standards of its predecessor. Contributions by Alexander Wilder. NYPL; LOC. Issues:Bibliotheca Platonica V1 N1 Jul-Aug 1889 Bibliotheca Platonica V1 N2 Nov-Dec 1889 Bibliotheca Platonica V1 N3 May-Jun 1890 Bibliotheca Platonica V1 N4 Nov-Dec 1890
